params.sync_server: Save all parameters to Twitchat server
params.customize_sections: Drag menu items in and out here
params.firstMessage: Show the first message of every viewer on a seperate list so you don't forget to say hello
params.firstMessage_info: For a standalone alternative check out {URL}
params.firstUserBadge: Show if it's the first day of a viewer on your channel
params.recentAccountUserBadge: Show if user's account is less than 1 week old
params.markAsRead: Click a message to remember where you stopped reading
params.conversationsEnabled:
Group conversations
(allows to display conversations between users seperately)
params.userHistoryEnabled: See all user's messages when hovering their name
params.autoRemod: Give back moderators their role after their timeout ends
params.raidHighlightUserDuration: Highlight for {VALUE} minute | Highlight for {VALUE} minutes
params.raffleHighlightUserDuration: Highlight for {VALUE} minute | Highlight for {VALUE} minutes
params.groupIdenticalMessage:
Group identical messages of a user
(sending the exact same message less than 30s later brings it back to bottom and increments a counter on it)
params.offlineEmoteOnly: Set chat on emote-only when not live
params.stopStreamOnRaid: Cut OBS stream after a raid
params.antiHateRaid:
Anti hate raid
(If multiple 1st time chatter send the same message, parts of this message will be added to your blocked terms to prevent more users to send it.
Disabled for 3min after receiving an actual Twitch raid.
Disabled if other regular viewer also send the same message.)
params.antiHateRaidDeleteMessage: Delete messages that started the anti hate raid
params.chatShoutout_info: Send this message when doing a /shoutout
params.liveMessages: Show latest messages when chat paused
params.liveAlerts: Get notified when someone you follow starts or ends a live (5min delay)
params.multiChatAvatar:
Show channels profile pic next to messages from other channels
(If you connect to another Twitch chat, messages from other chans than yours will get a distinct color border on the left unless this option is enabled)
params.sharedChatHide: Only show messages from my own channel during a shared chat session
params.highlight1stEver: Highlight 1st message ever of a user
params.highlight1stToday: Highlight 1st user's message of the day
params.displayTimeRelative: Show elapsed duration since reception instead of reception time
params.ad_info: Message sent on your chat every 2 hours (if you received at least 100 messages and have more than 50 followers)
params.ad_disable_info: To disable this message, make any donation or become a Premium member 💝
params.ad_bot_info_title: Can this message be sent by nightbot / wizebot / ...?
params.ad_bot_info_content:
Yes

By default the message is posted with your account.
But you can configure any other bot to send that message if you wish.

Twitchat won't send the message as long as a message containing twitchat.fr is sent on the chat by anyone at least every 2h.
params.saveHistory:
Keep chat history after reloading Twitchat
(you'll find all the messages back after reloading Twitchat)
params.clearChat_confirm_desc: This will clear the chat for your viewers.
params.mergeConsecutive: Merge consecutive messages of a user
params.mergeConsecutive_maxSize: Do not merge the message if it's longer than {VALUE} chars
params.mergeConsecutive_maxSizeTotal: Maximum total size of the merged messages
params.mergeConsecutive_minDuration: Merge only if duration between the 2 messages is lower than {VALUE}s
params.autoTranslateFirst: Translate 1st message of a user when necessary
params.autoTranslateFirst_spoken:
Languages you're able to read
(these messages won't be translated)

botMessages.raffleStart: /announce 🎉🎉🎉 Raffle has started 🎉🎉🎉 Use {CMD} command to enter!
botMessages.raffleTipsStart: /announce 🎉🎉🎉 Raffle has started 🎉🎉🎉 Enter by donating on {PLATFORMS}!
botMessages.raffleTipsJoin: VoteYea {USER} entered the raffle by donating {AMOUNT} on {PLATFORM}.
botMessages.raffleTipsWinner: /announce 🎉🎉🎉 {USER} you won the raffle by donating {AMOUNT} on {PLATFORM} 🎉🎉🎉
botMessages.shoutout: /announce Go checkout {USER} {URL} . Their last stream title was "{TITLE}" in category "{CATEGORY}".
botMessages.twitchatAd: /announcepurple Are you a Twitch streamer? I'm using GivePLZ twitchat.fr TakeNRG, a full featured chat alternative for streamers. Check it out KomodoHype
botMessages.chatSuggStart: /announce Make your suggestion by typing "{CMD} your suggestion". Your suggestion must be less than {LENGTH} chars.
botMessages.qnaStart: /announce Q&A session started! Use command {CMD} to submit a question.

commands.timerAdd: Add time to the current timer
commands.timerRemove: Remove time from the current timer
commands.countdownAdd: Add time to the current countdown
commands.countdownRemove: Remove time from the current countdown
commands.search: Search for a message by its content
commands.userfromid: Get a user from their ID
commands.alertStreamer: Triggers Twitchat's "!alert" feature. Made for use within the triggers.
commands.subscribers: Set chat on sub only mode
commands.tts: Start reading the messages of a user
commands.betaadd: Add a user to the beta-testers
commands.betadel: Remove a user from the beta-testers
commands.greetduration: Sets the greet them auto delete duration
commands.betamigrate: Migrate user data from beta to production
commands.warn: Send a warning to the given user
commands.giftpremium: Gift premium membership to given user
commands.ungiftpremium: Removes gifted premium membership from given user
